short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 一个打开网站，自动生成当前网站的二维码工具。
short.en: A tool that opens a website and generates a QR code for the current website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
安装 「Auto Gen QR code — 自动生成二维码」拓展之后，打开页面之后在页面右侧（默认）生成一个以当前访问链接为内容的二维码，鼠标移动上去，会显示放大后的二维码，可以使用移动扫码快速访问。

功能列表：

- 启动/停止
- 自定义二维码在页面的位置
- 支持查看大图
- 支持复制二维码
- 支持下载二维码
- 支持暗黑模式
- 支持在特定的网站上暂停显示
- 支持设定二维码距离页面上下边缘的距离
long.en:
After installing the "Auto Gen QR code - Generate QR Code Automatically" extension, a QR code is generated on the right side of the page (by default) with the current visiting link as its content when the page is opened. Hovering the mouse over it displays an enlarged version of the QR code, allowing quick access through mobile scanning.

Feature List:

- Start/Stop
- Customize the position of the QR code on the page
- Support for viewing the enlarged image
- Support for copying the QR code
- Support for downloading the QR code
- Dark mode support
- Support pausing display on specific websites
- Supports setting the distance between the QR code and the upper and lower edges of the page
